00042 void niboCom_putchar(uint8_t c){
00043         while(uart0_txfull() == true);
00044         uart0_putchar(c);
00045         delay(2);
00046 }

00052 uint8_t niboCom_getchar(){
00053         if(uart0_rxempty()==false) return uart0_getchar();
00054         return 0;
00055 }

00063 void niboCom_putPacket(uint8_t cmd, uint8_t size, uint8_t *data){
00064         int i = 0;
00065 
00066         //startsign
00067         niboCom_putchar(0x68);
00068 
00069         niboCom_putchar(cmd);
00070         niboCom_putchar(size);
00071         for(i = 0; i < size;i++){
00072                 niboCom_putchar(data[i]);
00073         }
00074         //endsign
00075         niboCom_putchar(0x16);
00076 }

00082 void niboCom_putIRDistance(uint16_t *data){
00083         int i = 0;
00084         uint8_t distance[5];
00085         //scale values from uint16_t down to uint8_t
00086         for(i = 0; i < 5;i++){
00087                 distance[i] = data[i]/256;
00088         }
00089 
00090         niboCom_putPacket(niboCom_cmd_ir_distance,5, distance);
00091 }

00123 uint8_t niboCom_getCMD(){
00124 
00125         uint8_t tmp = lastCMD;
00126         if(tmp != niboCom_cmd_none){
00127                 lastCMD = niboCom_cmd_none;
00128         }
00129 
00130         return tmp;
00131 }

00137 void niboCom_uartInterrupt(){
00138         //wait until rx buffer is not empty
00139         while(uart0_rxempty() == true);
00140         uint8_t c = niboCom_getchar();
00141 
00142         //wait for startsign
00143         if(c == 0x68){
00144                 startSignReceived = true;
00145         }
00146         else if(startSignReceived != true){
00147                 return;
00148         }
00149         //fill buffer
00150         buffer[bufferPos++] = c;
00151 
00152         //check wheter the 4th char is the endsign or not
00153         if(bufferPos == 4){
00154                 bufferPos = 0;
00155                 startSignReceived = false;
00156                 if(c == 0x16){
00157                         lastCMD = buffer[1];
00158                 }
00159         }
00160 
00161 }
